channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for KS
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for KS

item.title: Report X-2024030328
item.description:
Report X-2024030328

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-14T18:15:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-05
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: MANAGER NOTICED THE PACKAGE WAS LEAKING AND NOTIFIED QA. QA PLACED THE PACKAGE IN A LINED TOTE AND CLEANED UP THE SPILL. THE PACKAGE WAS THEN TAKEN TO THE PROCESSING CAGE. DescribePack: ONE BOTTLE HAD A LOOSE CAP AND LEAKED OUT SOILING THE BOX. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: MANAGER NOTICED THE PACKAGE WAS LEAKING AND NOTIFIED QA. QA PLACED THE PACKAGE IN A LINED TOTE AND CLEANED UP THE SPILL. THE PACKAGE WAS THEN TAKEN TO THE PROCESSING CAGE. DescribePack: BOTH BOTTLES WERE LEAKING OUT FROM AROUND THE CAPS. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE.

item.title: Report X-2024021695
item.description:
Report X-2024021695

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-14T18:15:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-21
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO LEAKING PACKING IN THE UNLOAD WITH FULL PPE ON. USING THE DECISION TREE THE RESPONDER CLEANED UP THE LEAKING PACKAGE AND PLACED ALL MATERAL IN A LINED SPILL TUB. THE RESPONDER TRANSPORTED THE MATERIAL TO DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. UPON ARRIVAL NOTED THAT ONE 1 GALLON METAL CAN WAS DENTED AND LEAKING. THE LEAKING CAN LEAKED ON THREE OTHER CANS. ALL MATERIAL WAS DISPOSED OF THOUGH DMP.

item.description:
Report X-2024021694

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-21
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS

  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS ON PALLET IN DAMAGE PROCESSING ARE AWAITING ACCEPTANCE AUDIT WHEN A RESPONDER NOTICED PACKAGE WAS WET. PACKAGE WAS PLACED INTO SPILL TUB AND PROCESSED THROUGH DMP.

item.title: Report X-2024021696
item.description:
Report X-2024021696
